trans-unit.source: Represents an items control that hosts <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTabHeader"></xref> items.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTabHeaderItemsControl"></xref> class.
A new <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTabHeader"></xref> container object that is used to display an item from the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items*> collection.
trans-unit.target: 一个新<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTabHeader"></xref>用于显示中的一个项的容器对象<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items*>集合。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items*>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTabHeaderItemsControl"></xref> supports custom keyboard scrolling.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示是否<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTabHeaderItemsControl"></xref>支持自定义键盘滚动。

trans-unit.source: This property is used to notify the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTabHeaderItemsControl> that keyboard input has been handled the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTabHeaderItemsControl>.
trans-unit.target: 此属性用于通知<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>中<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTabHeaderItemsControl>，已处理键盘输入<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTabHeaderItemsControl>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTabHeaderItemsControl> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTabHeaderItemsControl> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>在所有情况下。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the specified item is (or is eligible to be) its own container.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个值，该值指示指定的项 （是否可以作为） 其自己的容器。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the item is a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTabHeader"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果该项是<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTabHeader"> </xref>; 否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Builds the visual tree for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTabHeaderItemsControl"></xref> when a new template is applied.
trans-unit.target: 生成的可视化树<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTabHeaderItemsControl"></xref>应用新模板时。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonTabHeaderItemsControlAutomationPeer"></xref> object for this control.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个新<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonTabHeaderItemsControlAutomationPeer"></xref>对于此控件的对象。

trans-unit.source: A new automation peer object for this control.
trans-unit.target: 对于此控件作为新自动化对等对象。

trans-unit.source: Prepares the specified element to display the specified item.
trans-unit.target: 准备要显示指定的项的指定的元素。

trans-unit.source: The element that is used to display the item.
The item to display from the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items*> collection.
